name: Wahyu Ikbal Maulana
summary: Results-oriented data scientist with 2+ years of experience in Python, R, and Machine learning. Proficient in deploying AI models and collaborating on web application integration. Passionate about applying data-driven solutions to real-world problems. Actively engaged in the academic community, participating in various competitions and projects to enhance technical skills and teamwork abilities.

details: Actively participated in faculty research projects since the first year of study.
Assist and contribute to the final project research of D3 students and ITS master students.
Regularly engaged in campus competitions and forums.
Utilized Python libraries such as numpy, pandas, sklearn, pytorch, and torch geometry to develop optimization methods.
Developing proficiency in programming languages such as Python and R, laying the groundwork for future studies in Big Data.
Completed the Mathematics and Natural Sciences (MIPA) program at SMA Negeri 8 Surabaya with a strong foundation in scientific principles and mathematical concepts.
Actively participated in various science and math competitions, demonstrating a commitment to academic excellence and a passion for continuous learning.

responsibilities: Processed and analyzed datasets to create comprehensive company reports, leading to improved decision-making.
Created a visualization dashboard that contributed to a improvement in cross-team efficiency and overall productivity.

Analyzed financial statements, business summary reports, and dashboard recaps to attain data based on product comparable percentages and penetration rates for district managers which increased store efficiency by 16%.

Collaborated with senior management on multiple functions including customer success and finance, increasing survey submissions from 60% previous month to 75% by identifying the pain points of customer feedback.
Develop and implement innovative AI projects to enhance community engagement and productivity.
Manage projects community, overseeing timelines, resources, and division communication.
Developed a Generative AI model utilizing multiple large language models.
Collaborated with a team of 5 members to build and refine the AI project.
Conducted in-depth research on Large Language Models (LLMs) and Natural Language Processing (NLP) to understand their capabilities, limitations, and best practices for application in generative AI.
Created detailed Entity-Relationship Diagrams (ERDs) to visualize and document the data structure and relationships within the AI project.
Design and improve the web UI for HIMA IT Dynamic Apps activities.
Created infographics based on data to effectively communicate key information.
Utilized various design tools and software to produce high-quality infographics.
Applied best practices in data visualization to enhance clarity and impact of the infographic.
Designed self-management training materials to support students' development skills.
Used strong public speaking skills to explain complex topics in an easy-to-understand way.
Organized and structured participant data for effective program planning and follow-up.
Supported event logistics for 200+ participants by coordinating schedules.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to maintain effective communication.

projects.title: Chatbot Kelurahan Keputih
details: Engineered and optimized vector database for efficient data retrieval and storage.
Implemented and fine-tuned language models (LLMs) to enhance chatbot language understanding and generation.
Optimized embeddings to improve semantic search capabilities and response relevance.

projects.title: ARIMA Analysis Energy in Indonesia
details: Implemented ARIMA modeling, including data preparation, model fitting, and forecasting.
Developed a detailed process flowchart poster to visually represent the ARIMA model workflow.
Authored a research paper and produced an explanatory video to illustrate the findings of the ARIMA model.

projects.title: Anime Recommendation System
details: Worked collaboratively to develop an anime recommendation system.
Designed and implemented the website, ensuring a user-friendly interface with the recommendation engine.
Developed a machine learning model using collaborative filtering techniques to provide personalized anime suggestions.

projects.title: Telecom Churn Prediction
details: Developed a machine learning model to predict customer churn in the telecommunications industry.
Optimized model hyperparameters to improve prediction accuracy and reduce false positives.

projects.title: Rock Scissor Paper Classification using CNN
details: Developed and trained a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model for classifying Rock-Paper-Scissors gesture images.
Constructed and fine-tuned CNN architecture using TensorFlow/Keras libraries.

projects.title: Analytical Dashboard Using Deep Learning
details: Conducted comprehensive data collection from multiple agricultural sources, ensuring data quality and relevance.
Designed and implemented ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to prepare data for advanced analytics.
Researched and applied data mining techniques to extract valuable information from agricultural report documents.

projects.title: Personal Blog
details: Built a static personal blog using Next.js with SEO optimization.
Authored and published weekly articles on productivity and technology, demonstrating proficient content writing skills.
Achieved an average score of 92 for website performance, SEO, and speed, demonstrating technical proficiency.
